tool_description: Custom deal feed for Amazon online, providing daily updates for coupons, discounts, and special price breaks along with the necessary information, images, tags, and links directly to the products.
title: Amazon Deals Coupons

api_list.name: Get Amazon Deals
api_list.description: Endpoint to get daily Amazon deals
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-deals-coupons.p.rapidapi.com/amazon/deals"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-deals-coupons.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search in Amazon Deals
api_list.description: Endpoint to search in Amazon deals by keywords
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-deals-coupons.p.rapidapi.com/amazon/products_keyword"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-deals-coupons.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-deals-coupons.p.rapidapi.com/amazon/products_keyword"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-deals-coupons.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
